page.title: 16Shopping in the area
page.content: {Waldringfield}has a good{General} {Store}with a{Post Office}counter service.The shop offers a wide variety of goods with a wide selection of stock suited to the seasonal trade of the boating fraternity.There is also a ships chandlers also selling fancy goods and souvenirs.The{General Store {at Shottisham }is a smaller concern but also offers{Post Office}counter service.A{mobile shop},dealing mostly in harware, tours the villages of Shottisham and the surrounding area regularly. These few shops give only limited shopping facilities to the residents. For a wider range of foodstuffs people would need to travel to nearby Woodbridge or further afield to Ipswich or Felixstowe. Americans resident in the area do most of their shopping at the airbase.
